markdown:
| icon           = poe2 lobster_icon.png
| description    = These crustaceans amble around the ocean floor, eating the leavings of other creatures. Largely disregarded by the locals, their meat is highly coveted by foreigners and it falls to local spear fishers and trappers to meet the growing demand. The most desirable specimens, like this one, have grown large and sweet from their proximity to luminous adra. Consuming their meat steadies the nerves and increases focus.
